name: Avian Terrarium
description:
This was a small project so that I could test out Unity projects in Lively Wallpaper

The terrarium does work with lively wallpaper, but it does not register inputs.

Clicking the mouse will feed the birds and case a random number of them to spawn. Birds will die if they are not fed, they will die. 

Birds also spawn every couple of seconds.

I do not plan on continuing to work on this project so I am also uploading the source code so if anyone wants to make their own builds, they are more than welcome to. 

If I find the time to keep working on it, I'll try to create a color randomizer for the birds and more ways to interact with the birds and for birds to interact with the environment.

NOTE:

WHEN USING WITH LIVELY THE RESOLUTION CAN BE A BIT WONKY, SO OPEN AND CLOSE LIVELY
 UNTIL IT ADJUSTS TO YOUR RESOLUTION
